content:
Hello Everyone!

@Deirdre Kirmis and I will be attending the Dublin Core Metadata Initiative (DCMI) Conference (Oct. 20-23) in Toronto and we wanted to see if any of our Dataverse colleagues will be attending or in the area so we can meet up!

Any suggestions for places to visit or food is also highly appreciated! :big_smile:

Thanks,

Rachel Fernandez

@Rachel Fernandez very cool. Please check out this thread where there was some chatter about adding events like this to a spreadsheet (which you are welcome to request edit access to!) and maybe even the GDCC website some day (/cc @Philip Durbin ğŸ‰ ).
@Rachel Fernandez sure. I just gave you access to edit that spreadsheet.
Please feel free to post to https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community as well :grinning:
